original_title: Link Sar: The Last Great Unclimbed Mountain
overview: Link Sar follows Zimmerman, an elite American alpinist, while he attempts to climb (and survive) one of the world’s most challenging unclimbed peaks, alongside his climbing partners Steve Swenson, Chris Wright, and Mark Richey.
tagline: 2019 Piolet d’Or-winning ascent of Link Sar (7,041 m) in the Pakistani Karakoram
title: Link Sar: The Last Great Unclimbed Mountain
